RelatedSentence: Governor Jerry Brown says if you want to know the cause of California 's wildfires , just look to global warming .

Governor Jerry Brown says if you want to know the cause of California 's wildfires , just look to global warming .
Brown told ABC 's This Week climate change is responsible for the hot , dry conditions that are fueling the flames .
Brown also says Republicans are in denial of the reality of climate change .
